isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - OPERATION - SEAT ADJUSTMENT

svcsubproc.title: Forward/Aft
svcsubproc.para:
The adjustment slide bar is located on the right side of the driver's seat cushion. To adjust the knee/hip room to the desired position, push the slide bar forward to the correct location and release the bar to lock in place ( Figure 21). NOTE: Air and mechanical adjustment seats or other customer specified driver seats may vary.
See the seat installed in your bus for proper adjustment.

svcsubproc.title: Reclining
svcsubproc.para: The reclining control lever is located above the forward/aft adjustment bar. To operate the reclining lever, pull the lever up, lean back to the desired position and release the lever ( Figure 22).

svcsubproc.title: Height
svcsubproc.para: The pedestal height can be adjusted either up or down by using the adjustment lever on the pedestal. Loosen the holding screws and raise height adjustment lever and adjust seat as required.
